text_block_list.text:
After Narita Brian experiences a sudden, sharp pain in her legs, we 
rush her to the hospital for an examination.

There, we learn that the cause is arthritis in the upper leg, and that 
she won't be able to race for several months.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Ahaaa, that was a good run! Time for a much-needed rest.
Yeah, take a five-minute break, then we'll move on to start drills.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I should mention, with this spring's Tenno Sho getting close, reporters 
have started coming again.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Normally, I would expect them to be here for Brian since she was 
scheduled for the race, but that's not the case anymore…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I'm happy she's not gravely hurt, but she'll be recuperating through 
spring, won't she?
Yeah…
Yeah…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Nothing wrong with taking a break. She'll be back to crushing the 
competition in no time!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hey, you there!
What's the commotion?
What's the commotion?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
What's the commotion?! Isn't Brian injured?! So why's she training at 
the gym?!
What?!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Exhale…
Brian! You're in no condition to be training right now!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: It's my legs that are hurt. The rest of my body is perfectly fine.
I know that, but you need to rest!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
There are still things I can do. You know racing is no simple game you 
can win without working for it.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: And I'm racing to win. I run to get to the finish before anyone else.

Brian's always been an insatiable runner. It seems not even her injury 
can change that.

I'm still worried though. If your condition gets bad enough, I'll be 
forced to stop you from racing.

I'm still worried though. If your condition gets bad enough, I'll be 
forced to stop you from racing.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: So are you going to stop this training too?

No, a trainer's responsibility is to support their racers. I respect your 
feelings more than anything.

No, a trainer's responsibility is to support their racers. I respect your 
feelings more than anything.

That's why I'm going to watch you closely while you train with that 
injury. We'll explore our options and prepare for your comeback race.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Huh… Sounds good.

With Brian unable to run, we start a new, special training regimen for 
her.

Doing core training will let us strengthen your inner muscles. This'll 
prevent weakening while you can't put any load on your joints.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Exhale… That's three sets. How many more should I do?
We'll rest in between, but let's do six more.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Got it. I'll do triple that.
Huh?! Triple?!

It seems like your pain's subsided, but it's too early to run. So starting 
today, we're going to strengthen your legs in the pool. There's less 
weight on them that way.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Got it. Let me just get some tires to tie to my body while I swim.
Tires?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
That'll increase water resistance, right? I'm trying to increase muscle 
strength, not maintain it.
Hm, only you'd come up with an idea like that. Okay, let's try it!
Hm, only you'd come up with an idea like that. Okay, let's try it!
Now we're finally ready to get back to running!
Now we're finally ready to get back to running!

Just, you know, take it easy. There's less impact on the dirt, so let's 
settle into things gradually.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
You've been practically glued to my side since my injury. What about 
the others?
Don't worry, I'm watching everyone else too.
Besides, your training is just as interesting to watch as your racing.
Besides, your training is just as interesting to watch as your racing.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
You're a strange one to get a kick out of watching someone train. 
Then I hope you won't mind staying until sunset.
She makes no compromises with her workouts.

What attracts her fans might not just be her strength, but her endless 
hunger to win.
Finally, the day comes when Brian is back to her normal routine.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
How long were you gonna keep us waiting? I know you've been 
itching to run as fast as you can, you wacky wonder!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Did the doctor say this is okay?
Yeah, the inflammation's gone down, so it's no problem.
Yeah, the inflammation's gone down, so it's no problem.

And I've been watching her this whole time. She doesn't seem to be 
favoring the injury or anything.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Sweet, time to get your run on! Brian's off to the races!

Watching you these past weeks, I've been reminded just how much 
you want to win.

Watching you these past weeks, I've been reminded just how much 
you want to win.

And just like Golshi said, we've been waiting for this day! Time to 
make up for everything you've been holding back!

And just like Golshi said, we've been waiting for this day! Time to 
make up for everything you've been holding back!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: You don't have to tell me!
The fearless runner dashes down the track with an intense momentum.

How will she race in the fall? I can't help but start getting excited 
again.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: So it's not going to be that easy, huh?
